Hi, I finally managed to install it on a server with gcc 4.9.2 in one fell swoop, with all components functional :) However, on several other servers on which i work, the gcc version is higher than 4.9.2. On one of the servers with gcc higher than 4.9.2, i can use the functionality of using several gpu s I did the complete installation on a server with gcc 4.9.2. About the usage + possibility to use several gpu s: -I generate the fbank features on the 4.9.2 gcc server, -and if I want to use several gpu s for training, I run it on the server with several gpu s (with a gcc compiler > 4.9.2), which seems to work Initially, I tried an installation setup on a server with gcc > 4.9.2, where the 4.9.2 gcc compiler was in my home directory on a shared server. However, the warp ctc was not well installed and I had to install it separately... using <denchmark-link:https://github.com/SeanNaren/warp-ctc>https://github.com/SeanNaren/warp-ctc</denchmark-link>
ESPnet is a great tool, my compliments! Are there any plans to adapt it to install it with a compiler > 4.9.2 ? Thanks
